Injector/Manterror/Double Punch:



Manterror cursed, rolling to the left, a few stinger missiles cracking open 
his armor, causing him to leak mech-fluid.

---

Injector, still very concious, yelled as someone took his stinger missile 
launcher.  Looking up, he saw TK, firing off three optic blasts at his right 
heel.

---

Double Punch fired off one energy-signature seeking missile at TK's chest.
